text: Etu karone khali biswas pora he manu khan Isor laga kosom to pabo, eneka hoile manu khan Isor laga kosom to anugrah pora ase aru Abraham laga sob khandan khan etu kosom to pabo- khali niyom te thaka khan nimite nohoi, kintu jun khan Abraham laga biswas ke piche kore, eitu khan bhi pabo. Tai amikhan sob laga baba ase,
